title: Custom skins?
body: i have never used custom skins and i dont plan to if riot says no but are they allowed? i just like the fact that you can use a skin that nobody else can see and it doesnt cost soooo much money

replies.body: Officially it's "use at your own risk". But so long as you don't use a skin mod that gives you an official skin that you don't own, it's probably ok.
